## Checklist
- [ ] `node --check bin/cli.js` passes
- [ ] `node bin/cli.js --help` works
- [ ] `node bin/cli.js --list` shows all themes
- [ ] ShellCheck passes on any modified `.sh` files
- [ ] `theme.json` validates (if adding/modifying a theme)
